Posts.Content: May 10, 2008 12:56AM Sadie-Rose wrote: Hi Everyone, I've been posting on the triple negative breast cancer thread.  I finished treatment about four years ago.  I had surgery in October and had a pulmonary embolism (blood clots to my lungs.) Now my oncologist wants to run tests to see if I have Lupus.  I thought the treatment might have triggered the symptoms of Lupus.  I developed a skin condition right after I finished radiation treatment .  It is called Vitiligo.  It is an autoimmune condition which causes white blotches on my skin.  So as I research breast cancer, Lupus, Vitiligo and blood cots there seems to be a connection.  I do think I had symptoms before my cancer treatment.   Does this make sense. Sadie
Posts.Title: How many with BC and autoimmune diseases like LUPUS, RA, ? badboob67 wintersocks
